dc:title: Appeal - May 1962
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A semi-annual appeal for funds, noting their expenses for food, rend, and even burials. Says it's foolish, but calculates they've served 132,000 meals since the last appeal. Points to the widow who fed Elias when he begged and her reward.
